text: Valley Brook is an unincorporated community in Noble Township, Wabash County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is located within the city limits of Wabash. ==History== Valley Brook was platted in 1958. ==Geography== Valley Brook is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Wabash County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Valley Brook, Indiana
